title: (x) Unknown San Serif from Radiant Child - Monotype Grotesque {Marc O}
content:
Can anyone help me identify this san serif? It's from the title sequence of the new Basquiat Movie:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXjR-y0WH-I](http://web.archive.org/web/20100305101459/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXjR-y0WH-I "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXjR-y0WH-I")

Thank you.

author: atugs

comments.content: Looks like another weight of MT Grotesque is used for the subtitles, too.
